headline: Franklin Resources, Inc. Announces Quarterly Dividend and Addition to Stock Repurchase Program
summary: SAN MATEO, Calif., December 17, 2025--Franklin Resources, Inc. (the "Company") [NYSE:BEN] announced a quarterly cash dividend in the amount of $0.33 per share payable on January 9, 2026 to stockholders of record holding shares of common stock at the close of business on December 30, 2025. The quarterly dividend of $0.33 per share represents a 3.1% increase over the dividends paid for the prior quarter and the same quarter last year. The Company has raised its dividend every year since 1981.
